activities: Best Western International, Inc. processes personal information as required in order to conduct its lodging business related activities including facilitating the operation and maintenance of a central reservations system and a frequency marketing program known generally as "Gold Crown Club International."  Further details are provided in the company's privacy policy.  BWI also collects the personally identifiable information of Travel Card purchasers and users
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Best Western International, Inc. is participating in the BBB EU Safe Harbor program where customer complaints will be handled according to procedures designed by BBB and BBB will act as a neutral third party engaged to resolve disputes regarding Best Western International, Inc.'s compliance with the requirements of the Safe Harbor program.
